2.vid: /3/31/Tell if a Mango Is Ripe Step 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Do not fixate on the color.
3.vid: /2/2b/Tell if a Mango Is Ripe Step 3.360p.mp4

4.vid: /f/f4/Tell if a Mango Is Ripe Step 4.360p.mp4

5.vid: /b/b0/Tell if a Mango Is Ripe Step 5.360p.mp4

6.text: Avoid a mango with a sour or alcoholic scent.
6.vid: /c/ce/Tell if a Mango Is Ripe Step 6.360p.mp4

7.vid: /b/b8/Tell if a Mango Is Ripe Step 7.360p.mp4

8.vid: /b/b7/Tell if a Mango Is Ripe Step 8.360p.mp4

9.vid: /2/26/Tell if a Mango Is Ripe Step 9.360p.mp4

10.text: Place the mango in a brown paper bag.
10.vid: /f/f8/Tell if a Mango Is Ripe Step 10.360p.mp4

11.text: Sit the mango out at room temperature.
11.vid: /9/99/Tell if a Mango Is Ripe Step 11.360p.mp4

12.text: Move the mango to a refrigerator once ripe.
12.vid: /0/00/Tell if a Mango Is Ripe Step 12.360p.mp4
